version_description:
- Soft Launch Season 1 has begun! Lots of season quests and rewards are awaiting!
- Top-up system is opened. Players can obtain fashion set by opening up the Legendary Supplies purchased with Credit.
- Follow-up function is added. Players can choose squadmate to follow to the target site.
- One click to switch scope and one click to switch gun options are added.
- New Year Event will be open! Players can obtain event-limed rewards by completing the event quests.

- Soft Launch Season 1 has begun! Lots of season quests and rewards are awaiting!
- Top-up system is opened. Players can obtain fashion set by opening up the Legendary Supplies purchased with Credit.
- Follow-up function is added. Players can choose squadmate to follow to the target site.
- One click to switch scope and one click to switch gun options are added.
- New Year Event will be open! Players can obtain event-limed rewards by completing the event quests.

- The friend affection system is now online. Play matched games with friends to get Affection. Raise your Affection to unlock different relationship tabs!
- Optimized Season system. Season level cap was increased to Lv 200. Complete challenge quests for challenge medals to exchange for rewards!
- etc.

We've also optimized various systems and fixed some bugs that affect game experience. If you encounter any problems in the game, feel free to send us a feedback.

We've also optimized various systems and fixed some bugs that affect game experience. If you encounter any problems in the game, feel free to send us a feedback.

version_name: will be released in late April. When the time comes

version_description:
[New Season Preview]
Cyber Hunter Season 2 - Count Zero will officially launch at 5:00am on April 29 (server time). Season Level Rewards, Season Pass and Quantum Quick Pass Benefits, Season Quests, Season Challenges and Season Medals will be unlocked. Stay tuned.
[Global Event Preview]
The Cyber Hunter Global Version will be released in late April. When the time comes, we will open new servers for players to create their characters in advance. Are you ready?
The Global Version's "Cyber Coming" event will have a huge amount to offer. The event will be held between April 26 and May 28 (server time). Stay tuned!
[Key Scenario Changes]
1. Dreamland scenario changed.
• Rebuilt Mt. Lonely in its entirety. Paths and zone division have been improved and the number of supply points increased.
• Expanded the whole of Bridgehead Town and Vera Town area in the southwestern Wheat Fields, and improved zone division.
2. Updated login, lobby, Mall preview, face customization and vehicle display, making them more futuristic-looking and packed full of Cyber Punk sci-fi style features.
[Customization System Upgrade]
1. Updated the face customization system.
• Improved the UI layout of the face customization system. Optimized the UI touch operation. Now, you can view makeup and customized makeup colors easier. In addition, finer details have been adjusted.
• We've unlocked a bunch of free hairstyles and makeup based on the improved face data. Go get a new look now!
• In addition, new Outfits and Actions have been added to the style preview page. Now, it's easier for you to know which Outfits and Actions better match your new style.
2. New vehicle looks.
• New Windrider Paint: Lovely Sunshine. Has a great automotive lighting effect, which displays in a super cool way. You'll be the most rad guy on Dreamland if you own one!
• Over a dozen new vehicle paints added. With the run-up to the new Season and global launch event, they will be debuting soon!

1. Dreamland scenario changed.
• Rebuilt Mt. Lonely in its entirety. Paths and zone division have been improved and the number of supply points increased.
• Expanded the whole of Bridgehead Town and Vera Town area in the southwestern Wheat Fields, and improved zone division.
2. Updated login, lobby, Mall preview, face customization and vehicle display, making them more futuristic-looking and packed full of Cyber Punk sci-fi style features.
[Customization System Upgrade]
1. Updated the face customization system.
• Improved the UI layout of the face customization system. Optimized the UI touch operation. Now, you can view makeup and customized makeup colors easier. In addition, finer details have been adjusted.
• We've unlocked a bunch of free hairstyles and makeup based on the improved face data. Go get a new look now!

2. New vehicle looks.
• New Windrider Paint: Lovely Sunshine. Has a great automotive lighting effect, which displays in a super cool way. You'll be the most rad guy on Dreamland if you own one!
• Over a dozen new vehicle paints added. With the run-up to the new Season and global launch event, they will be debuting soon!

New Updates
Champion Brawler's in the ring. New Season Champion Brawler is coming soon with new skins. Level up to get them all! Look out for the new Skateboard and upgraded Motorcycle Paints too! More skins coming later. Lucky Spin Supply and Master Supply are being constantly updated, check them out!

version_name: will be released in late April. When the time comes

version_description:
Update Explained
- New Season - Matrix Awakens will officially start at 12:00 (server time) on August 29. The awakening is awaiting all Wanderers!
- New Vantage Point mode is now available. 8v8 showdown!
- New feature "Moments" is now available. See what other Wanderers' are up to!
- To ensure that the Wanderers' gaming experience remains consistent, we have optimized several parts of the game and fixed some bugs. If you encounter any problems in the game, feel free to send us some feedback.

[New Season Preview]

2. Updated login, lobby, Mall preview, face customization and vehicle display, making them more futuristic-looking and packed full of Cyber Punk sci-fi style features.
[Customization System Upgrade]
1. Updated the face customization system.
• Improved the UI layout of the face customization system. Optimized the UI touch operation. Now, you can view makeup and customized makeup colors easier. In addition, finer details have been adjusted.
• We've unlocked a bunch of free hairstyles and makeup based on the improved face data. Go get a new look now!

• Over a dozen new vehicle paints added. With the run-up to the new Season and global launch event, they will be debuting soon!

The innovative version will be launched this summer.

New mode: Six-Forces Blitz is coming soon.
One player left alive, all squadmates revived. Six forces contending, only one can triumph.

Revamped system. Introducing the Corps feature.
Mass all your powerful companions to fight as the strongest corps.

New season: Stormy Island
Season 3 will officially begin soon. Prepare to enjoy the summer warfare.

Revamped Mall: more new items.
The Mall has been upgraded to offer you a wide variety of fashion options. Now you can be anyone you want.

New Updates
Champion Brawler's in the ring. New Season Champion Brawler is coming soon with new skins. Level up to get them all! Look out for the new Skateboard and upgraded Motorcycle Paints too! More skins coming later. Lucky Spin Supply and Master Supply are being constantly updated, check them out!

New character - Battle Maiden
A lady from a wealthy family, a hot-tempered bombshell on the battlefield. New female lead Layla joins the battle.

All new weapon, countless paints.
Left hand for the perfect aim, right hand for the coolest spin. Dual SMGs, double the firepower.


New Season - Ultra-Titanium Battlefield
The new season is on. Special forces gather to fight for honor. Welcome to the battlefield of the future!

All new game mode, all new experience.
Quick Duel, Vantage Point Battle, Sniper Strike and Super Fight. Multiple PvP modes are now available.

New Season: Mobile Force
The Mobile Force is always ready to fight and protect, monitoring all areas all day long.

Share Function is here
Share outfits, wear the same as your friends; use the new share marker function to share your position with just one tap.

Community Updates, socialize with your friends
Join the new Super Topic function in Moments and interact with official accounts!

New Season: Mobile Force
The Mobile Force is always ready to fight and protect, monitoring all areas all day long.

Share Function is here
Share outfits, wear the same as your friends; use the new share marker function to share your position with just one tap.

Community Updates, socialize with your friends
Join the new Super Topic function in Moments and interact with official accounts!

New engine, better graphics
We've updated the lighting, terrain textures, foliage and buildings to bring you a more realistic Dreamland.

Fresh new first-person experience
Don't miss out on the thrilling faction battles. Enjoy an unprecedented gunfight experience with the new first-person POV.

New Season - Masked Assassin
Have you ever imagined yourself wearing a mask to live another life? Hegemon-King, Consort, and Biography of Vigilantes.

New Research Facility is complete
A new firearm modification is here to bring variety to your weapons. Collect, modify, upgrade; get advanced weapons.

Huge Faction Showdown update
New weapons have been added to the battlefield. A new gameplay mode, Domination, is available on all servers. Invite your friends to try it out.

Photo mode is available
Take screenshots, add stickers, and share them with the tap of a button. What are you waiting for? Become the coolest Wanderer

New feature: Quantum Communicator
Let your voice be heard! The Quantum Communicator is coming to all servers!

version_name: FeaturesChaos Arrives at CS7 Season—Havoc LeagueBe a cyborg mercenary at the city of night! Havoc League

version_description:
New Season, Deep Sea Lifesaving
A ship has sunk. The dire situation calls for an immediate rescue operation. The underwater mecha will help Wanderers with their rescue efforts!

Faction Showdown, New Improvements
New Faction Showdown Map – Avatar Factory awaits. Larger scale matches, from 8 players to 10!

Newly Improved Minimalistic Interface
New personalized card to show your character to others. Improved Stats screen for a more social atmosphere!

New Models For A More Sci-Fi Look
Dive into Classic matches in a new aircraft. The first Air Drop will give you a surprise!

version_name: FeaturesChaos Arrives at CS7 Season—Havoc LeagueBe a cyborg mercenary at the city of night! Havoc League

version_description:
New Season, Deep Sea Lifesaving
A ship has sunk. The dire situation calls for an immediate rescue operation. The underwater mecha will help Wanderers with their rescue efforts!

Faction Showdown, New Improvements
New Faction Showdown Map – Avatar Factory awaits. Larger scale matches, from 8 players to 10!

Newly Improved Minimalistic Interface
New personalized card to show your character to others. Improved Stats screen for a more social atmosphere!

New Models For A More Sci-Fi Look
Dive into Classic matches in a new aircraft. The first Air Drop will give you a surprise!

New Version Features
Chaos Arrives at CS7 Season—Havoc League
Be a cyborg mercenary at the city of night! Havoc League, the new season is launched with new season pass background. The secrets of Havoc League is waiting for wanderers to discover! Complete the season pass quests and get special Wukong and Nezha theme Fashions, and special rewards like Wukong theme Avatar.
New Faction Map Debut—Sky Garden

New Version Features

Be a cyborg mercenary at the city of night! Havoc League, the new season is launched with new season pass background. The secrets of Havoc League is waiting for wanderers to discover! Complete the season pass quests and get special Wukong and Nezha theme Fashions, and special rewards like Wukong theme Avatar.
New Faction Map Debut—Sky Garden
